metadata.name: Certain Kind of Solitude I
metadata.description:
Certain Kind of Solitude I - Oil and digital.

This project was made in collaboration with the Polish electronic-music producer, Kino Oko, to illustrate his 2016 album, "Certain Kind of Solitude".


[Certain Kind of Solitude on Spotify](https://open.spotify.com/album/4KOMjBwZM5489o45kDrLgZ?si=X3u7whDZR9iPhro-WiCAeA)
